thread.title_full: Ground News - Chandrayaan, Aditya-L1, Gaganyaan: The year India reached the Moon - and aimed for the Sun

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Chandrayaan, Aditya-L1, Gaganyaan: The year India reached the Moon - and aimed for the Sun
text:
Summary by Ground News 2023 will be remembered as the year we went to the Moon. Chandrayaan-3 touched down in the lunar south pole region. India continued its stride into space by sending an observation mission to the Sun. It also carried out a key test flight ahead of its planned mission to take astronauts into space in 2025.
